title: Modern Blackletter-style font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823032341im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_4477.png)

Hi there. Is anyone able to identify this clipped, Blackletter-ish font? Thanks in advance.
author: Stephen Lording

comments.content:
Haven't found a match. Some alternatives: [Metalista](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823032341/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/metalista), [Iron Warrior](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823032341/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cyberian-khatru/iron-warrior), [Area 51](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823032341/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/area51)  
Curiosity now. I'm always intrigued to know how people can come up with a quite complete alphabet without knowing the name... What's the sample's origin?

Thanks for the reply and the suggestions, Ryuk. I'm using artwork that was supplied by an agency and the type was all outlined. I think it's a custom design they've made up for the concept. Thanks again.
Thanks Stephen for taking time to feed my curiosity :)
